text: hi Danny Boy you recently decided to pay
your glorified Clerk

you don't do this
effective immediately we're gonna put a
scale policy in the place and we're

expected after the announcement you know

everybody will be falling out about how

this was a letter I got from my

as a business owner I was delighted to

is anyone else freaking out right now my
